updates.description: This feature automates the backup process for EFS file systems, meeting business and regulatory backup compliance requirements.
updates.automation_value: Eliminates the need for manual backups, saving time and reducing human error.
updates.business_impact: Improves business compliance and reduces risk of data loss.

updates.feature_name: AWS EFS Infrequent Access (IA) Storage Class Automation
updates.description: Automatically moves infrequently accessed files to the IA storage class, reducing storage costs.
updates.automation_value: Automates file storage management, saving time and reducing storage costs.
updates.business_impact: Optimizes storage usage and reduces operational costs.

updates.feature_name: AWS EFS API Update - Tagging Operations
updates.description: Introduces new endpoints for programmatically managing tags for EFS resources.
updates.automation_value: Automates tag management, saving time on manual tasks.
updates.business_impact: Improves resource organization and management efficiency.

updates.description: Automates the lifecycle management of files, moving files between storage classes based on age and access patterns.
updates.automation_value: Automates file lifecycle management, saving time and optimizing storage costs.
updates.business_impact: Optimizes storage usage and improves application performance.

updates.feature_name: AWS EFS Integration with AWS Backup
updates.description: Allows users to manage backups of their EFS file systems through AWS Backup, centralizing backup management across AWS services.
updates.automation_value: Centralizes backup management, saving time on backup tasks across different services.
updates.business_impact: Improves backup management efficiency and reduces operational complexity.

results.raw_output:
1. Update Name: AWS EFS Automated Backup
   Release Date: November 1, 2023
   Description: This feature allows users to automate the backup process for their EFS file systems. It provides an easy way to meet business and regulatory backup compliance requirements. Users can set a backup policy defining how frequently backups are created and how long they are retained.
   Automation Value: This feature automates the backup process, eliminating the need for manual backups. This saves time and reduces the risk of human error.

2. Update Name: AWS EFS Infrequent Access (IA) Storage Class Automation
   Release Date: March 15, 2024
   Description: This feature automatically moves files that have not been accessed for a certain period to the IA storage class, reducing storage costs. Users can define the inactivity period that triggers the move.
   Automation Value: This feature automates the process of moving infrequently accessed files to a cheaper storage class, saving users time and reducing storage costs.

3. Update Name: AWS EFS API Update - Tagging Operations
   Release Date: July 20, 2024
   Description: This API update introduces new endpoints for tagging operations. Users can now programmatically manage tags for their EFS resources, making it easier to organize, search for, and manage resources.
   Automation Value: This update provides automation potential by allowing users to manage resource tags programmatically, saving time on manual tag management.

4. Update Name: AWS EFS Lifecycle Management Automation
   Release Date: January 5, 2025
   Description: This feature automates the lifecycle management of files, automatically moving files between different storage classes based on their age and access patterns. This optimizes storage costs without impacting application performance.
   Automation Value: This feature automates file lifecycle management, saving users time and optimizing storage costs.

5. Update Name: AWS EFS Integration with AWS Backup
   Release Date: April 10, 2025
   Description: This integration allows users to manage backups of their EFS file systems through AWS Backup, providing a centralized place to manage backups across AWS services.
   Automation Value: This integration provides automation value by centralizing backup management, saving users time on backup tasks across different services.
